name: warsawjs-workshop-23-unit-converter
description: Unit Converter Project for WarsawJS Workshop 22 Group 1

scripts.lint: eslint backend/ converters/ && echo LINTING OK || (echo LINTING ERROR; false)
scripts.npmls: npm ls 2>&1 && echo NPMLS OK || echo NPMLS ERROR
scripts.sysinfo: uname -a && cat /proc/meminfo && df -h . && echo SYSINFO OK || echo SYSINFO ERROR
scripts.versions: echo -n 'NODE ' && node -v && echo -n 'NPM ' && npm -v && node -e 'console.log(process.versions);' && echo VERSIONS OK || echo VERSIONS ERROR
scripts.jest: jest && echo JEST OK || (echo JEST ERROR; false)
scripts.jest-cover: jest --coverage && echo JEST OK || (echo JEST ERROR; false)
scripts.tap: tap tests/tap/*.test.js && echo TAP OK || (echo TAP ERROR; false)
scripts.tap-cover: tap tests/tap/*.test.js --coverage && echo TAP OK || (echo TAP ERROR; false)
scripts.tape: tape tests/tape/*.test.js && echo TAPE OK || (echo TAPE ERROR; false)
scripts.mocha: mocha tests/mocha/*.test.js && echo MOCHA OK || (echo MOCHA ERROR; false)
scripts.testcafe: testcafe chrome:headless tests/testcafe/test.js --app "npm start" && echo TESTCAFE OK || (echo TESTCAFE ERROR; false)
scripts.testcafe:gui: testcafe chrome tests/testcafe/test.js --app "npm start" && echo TESTCAFE:GUI OK || (echo TESTCAFE:GUI ERROR; false)
scripts.test:gui: npm run lint && npm run tape && npm run tap && npm run mocha && npm run testcafe && echo NPM TEST OK || (echo NPM TEST ERROR; false)
scripts.test:nolint: npm run tape && npm run tap && npm run mocha && npm run testcafe && echo NPM TEST OK || (echo NPM TEST ERROR; false)
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run tape && npm run tap && npm run mocha && echo NPM TEST OK || (echo NPM TEST ERROR; false)

author: Rafa≈Ç Pocztarski <r.pocztarski@gmail.com> (http://pocztarski.com/)
